text:
Hi! I'm trying to get started with CRM development using React components. These are the instructions for <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/tree/main/with-crm-components|CRM Components Extensions> on Github:

```Getting started
1. Update your CLI to the latest version using npm install -g @HubSpot/cli@next
2. Create a new project with hs project create --templateSource="HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples"```
When I follow those instructions, I get this error:

```[ERROR] Unknown argument: templateSource```
How can I get started?
Hi Crystal, you should just use ‘hs project create’ without the template source to use our “getting started” template

Or we also have a sample project page in case you want to review something more complicated <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/sample-projects>
I’ll raise this issue with relevant team about fixing the readme instructions
